peachbox.scheduler package¶

Submodules¶

peachbox.scheduler.scheduler module¶

class peachbox.scheduler.scheduler.Scheduler[source]¶

Bases: object

Scheduler handles task management.

Scheduler: ** Events are defined, they are triggered eg. at a given time, time interval, job finish, manual trigger ** Events can have a payload for eg. information on path to file, Kafka topic ** Pipelines can subscribe and publish events ** use PubSub: http://pubsub.sourceforge.net/usage/usage_basic.html

static Instance()[source]¶
